2023.title: React
2023.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. React makes it painless to create interactive UIs with its component-based architecture and efficient state management.

2023.title: Vue 3
2023.description: The Progressive JavaScript Framework. Vue is approachable, performant and versatile - perfect for building modern SPAs and complex web interfaces with its Composition API.

2023.title: Next.js
2023.description: The React framework for production. Next.js enables features like hybrid static & server rendering, TypeScript support, smart bundling, and route pre-fetching out of the box.

2023.title: TypeScript
2023.description: Strongly typed JavaScript. TypeScript extends JavaScript by adding static type definitions, improving code quality and developer experience at scale.

2023.title: Tailwind CSS
2023.description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs. Tailwind provides low-level utility classes to build designs without writing custom CSS.

2023.title: Vite
2023.description: Next generation frontend tooling. Vite provides extremely fast development server start and hot module replacement using native ES modules.

2023.title: Svelte
2023.description: Cybernetically enhanced web apps. Svelte compiles components to highly efficient imperative code at build time, resulting in smaller bundles and better performance.

2023.title: Remix
2023.description: A full stack web framework focused on web standards and modern UX. Remix handles server rendering, caching, and data loading while providing excellent developer ergonomics.

2023.title: GraphQL
2023.description: A query language for APIs. GraphQL enables declarative data fetching where clients can specify exactly what data they need from a single endpoint.

2023.title: WebAssembly
2023.description: A binary instruction format enabling high-performance applications on web pages. WASM allows code written in languages like C++ and Rust to run in the browser at near-native speed.

2023.title: Jest
2023.description: Delightful JavaScript testing framework. Jest provides zero-config setup for unit testing React applications with features like snapshot testing and code coverage.

2023.title: Cypress
2023.description: Fast, easy and reliable end-to-end testing for anything that runs in a browser. Cypress enables real-time reloading for TDD workflows with built-in debugging tools.
